channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: EU委員会、ライバルの音楽ストリーミング・サービスとの競争を阻害したとしてアップルに180億ユーロの制裁金を科す。
item.description:
Javier Espinoza / Financial Times:
The EU Commission fines Apple €1.8B for stifling competition from rival music streaming services, the EU's third-largest antitrust fine; Apple plans to appeal  —  iPhone maker hit by first-ever Brussels fine as competition watchdogs step up scrutiny of Big Tech

item.title: 1991年からESPNでNFLを取材し、受賞歴のあるジャーナリスト、クリス・モーテンセン氏が3月3日に72歳で死去。モーテンセン氏は2016年にがんと診断された（ESPN）
item.description:
ESPN:
Chris Mortensen, an award-winning journalist who reported on the NFL for ESPN since 1991, died on March 3 at age 72; Mortensen was diagnosed with cancer in 2016  —  Chris Mortensen, an award-winning journalist who reported on the NFL for ESPN for more than three decades, died Sunday morning at the age of 72, his family announced.

item.title: 100以上の特許を持ち、VRの中で歩くことができる全方位ホロタイルフロアを構築した、ディズニー唯一の研究フェロー、ラニー・スムートのプロフィール（Marah Eakin/Wired）
item.description:
Marah Eakin / Wired:
A profile of Lanny Smoot, Disney's only research fellow, who holds 100+ patents and has built an omnidirectional HoloTile Floor to allow users to walk in VR  —  If you've ever seen a lightsaber at a Disney park or marveled at BB-8, you've seen Lanny Smoot's work.

item.title: HBOはデヴィッド・ザスラヴの下で、Netflixへのライセンス供与、マーケティング削減、レイオフなどを経て、ストリーミングDTCで黒字を達成したが、WBDの株価はYTDで25％以上下落している（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
While HBO hit streaming DTC profitability under David Zaslav, via licensing to Netflix, slashing marketing, layoffs, and more, WBD's stock is down 25%+ YTD  —  They chased Netflix and then they cut costs.  Neither has worked.  —  Good afternoon from Las Vegas; I am here for The Netflix Slam …

item.title: インドを拠点とするコンテンツ・ファームが、BBCやCNNを含む60以上の大手メディアになりすまし、記事を再投稿したり、プレスリリースの広告枠を売ったりしている（Ax Sharma/BleepingComputer）
item.description:
Ax Sharma / BleepingComputer:
An India-based content farm impersonates 60+ major media outlets, including the BBC and CNN, reposting articles and selling advertorial slots for press releases  —  BleepingComputer has discovered a content farm operating some 60+ domains named after popular media outlets, including the BBC …

item.title: ユニヴァーサル・ミュージック・グループのアーティストの音楽がTikTokから消えるなか、クリエイターたちはロイヤリティフリーの、ほとんど脈絡のないサウンドクリップに目を向けている（Reece Rogers/Wired）
item.description:
Reece Rogers / Wired:
As music from Universal Music Group artists disappears from TikTok, creators turn to royalty-free, almost-contextless sound clips  —  More Universal Music songs are disappearing from TikTok as the two companies fail to reach new agreements.  Sound clips are ready for their big break.

item.title: MSNBCのモーニング・ジョー、CNN、フォックス・ニュース、フィナンシャル・タイムズ、アップルのニュース・アプリ、レジャー用の珍しい本など、ジョー・バイデンのメディア・ダイエットを見てみよう（Tyler Pager/Washington Post）。
item.description:
Tyler Pager / Washington Post:
A look at Joe Biden's media diet, which includes MSNBC's Morning Joe, CNN, Fox News, the Financial Times, the Apple News app, and the rare book for leisure  —  After conversations with his grandchildren, fellow churchgoers and Delaware neighbors, the president brings their worries to the Oval Office

item.title: ウィキペディアの編集者グループが、ウィキペディアのルールに対する長年の不満の末に立ち上げた、米国の道路・高速道路専門のウィキサイト「AARoads」を見てみよう（Thomas Germain/Gizmodo）
item.description:
Thomas Germain / Gizmodo:
A look at AARoads, a dedicated US roads and highways wiki site started by a group of Wikipedia editors, after years of frustration over Wikipedia's rules  —  A group of Wikipedia editors wrote 15,000 articles on US roads and highways.  But after a fight over the platform's rules, they went rogue.

item.title: [スレッド】Desert Sun NewsGuildがGannettとの最初の契約で合意に達し、ストライキは3月3日に終了すると発表 (@tdsnewsguild)
item.description:
@tdsnewsguild:
[Thread] The Desert Sun NewsGuild says it has reached an agreement for its first contract with Gannett, and its strike is now set to end on March 3  —  BREAKING: The Desert Sun NewsGuild has reached an agreement for its first contract!!! We're thrilled to have a deal with immediate, life-changing raises for many of our members, annual raises for every member, and crucial workplace protections. More details to come, but first:...

item.title: 2024年のハリウッドの厳しい現状を分析、縮小とストライキの年から回復、供給ラインが能力通りに流れるには少なくとも1年かかる（マーク・ハリス／ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
Mark Harris / New York Times:
An analysis of Hollywood's grim status in 2024, recovering from a year of downsizing and strikes; supply lines will take at least a year to flow at capacity  —  The Academy Awards ceremony, which this year will take place on March 10, traditionally provides a reliable moment of optimism for a perennially anxious industry.

item.title: USAネットワーク、ディスカバリーチャンネル、MTVのようなケーブルTVネットワークの衰退を見てみよう。MTVの2023年のプライムタイムの平均視聴者数は256Kで、2014年の807Kから減少している（David Bauder/Associated Press）。
item.description:
David Bauder / Associated Press:
A look at the decline of cable TV networks like USA Network, Discovery Channel, and MTV; MTV's 2023 average prime-time audience was 256K, down from 807K in 2014  —  The list of memorable characters and personalities who entered popular culture through cable television is long: Honey Boo Boo.

item.title: Semaforメディアのマックスウェル・タニ記者が、コードカット、デジタルメディアにおけるニッチの重要性、AIによる脅威、悪いニュースを伝える気持ちについて語る（Scott Nover/Slate）
item.description:
Scott Nover / Slate:
Semafor media reporter Maxwell Tani talks about cord-cutting, the importance of niches for digital media, threats from AI, and how it feels to break bad news  —  Maxwell Tani is known for his work on an obituary beat of sorts.  A media reporter at Semafor, he always seems to be the first person …

item.title: 系図トラッカーのMyHeritageがOldNews.comを立ち上げ、主に1800年代と1900年代の新聞、小さな町のジャーナル、公報へのアクセスを年間99ドルで提供（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
Genealogy tracker MyHeritage launches OldNews.com, offering access to newspapers, small-town journals, and gazettes mainly from the 1800s and 1900s for $99/year  —  MyHeritage announced today that it's launching OldNews.com, a new website that offers access to thousands of historical newspapers, mainly from the 1800s and 1900s.

item.title: 米判事、グーグルは広告主の反トラスト法違反訴訟に向き合うべきとするも、大手広告主が使用する広告購入ツールに焦点を当てたものなど、一部の主張を棄却（ロイター）
item.description:
Reuters:
A US judge says Google must face advertisers' antitrust lawsuit, but dismisses some claims, including those focused on ad-buying tools used by large advertisers  —  Alphabet's (GOOGL.O) Google must face advertisers' proposed class action lawsuit claiming that it monopolizes the ad exchange market, a U.S. judge ruled on Friday.

item.title: ガネットのデザート・サン社で組合員がストライキ、公正な労働契約を求め、3年間定期的な生活費昇給を拒否されていると訴える (@tdsnewsguild)
item.description:
@tdsnewsguild:
Union members strike at Gannett's Desert Sun, calling for a fair labor contract and saying they've been denied regular cost-of-living raises for three years  —  It's official: As of 7 a.m. today, @TDSNewsGuild is now on strike!!! Taking this step is not easy. But after being denied any sort of regular cost of living raises for the last three years, we decided it's time to deny @Gannett our labor until a fair contract is reached!
